name: Sprout
physical_description: Sprout's body is a fusion of living wood and verdant moss, constantly growing and changing. It has two large, muscular arms, made of solid roots and bark, and a surprisingly agile, low-to-the-ground body. Its head is a single, hard-shelled seed, and its face is a simple, childlike carving in the wood. It communicates through gestures and the subtle rustling of the leaves and glowing flowers that grow from its body.
background: Sprout is a newly awakened forest guardian that emerged from the heart of the corrupted Whispering Woods. It has no memory of its past life, only an instinctive sense of dread at the corruption that plagues the world and a primal connection to Rya's draconic power. It is an empathic creature that communicates through simple gestures and feelings. As it grows, it may gain the power to purify corrupted locations, healing the world one step at a time.
voice: Does not speak, but communicates through a series of empathic feelings, simple gestures, and the rustling of its leaves.
quirk: It instinctively seeks out sources of sunlight or pure mana, a remnant of its nature as a forest guardian.
relationships: Its existence is directly tied to the party's efforts to heal the world, and it has imprinted on Rya, sensing a primal connection to her draconic power.
narrative_hook: Sprout is a key to understanding the deep corruption spreading through the land. Its growth and evolution are directly tied to the party's efforts to heal the world, and it may be able to purify corrupted locations.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path is inspired by Peco's incredible physical might and ability to shake the ground. It focuses on raw physical power, battlefield control, and unparalleled durability.

talents.name: Slam
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout slams its body into a single target. It deals 1d10 physical damage and has a chance to knock the target prone on a failed Might DC 12 check.

talents.name: Photosynthesis (Passive)
talents.effect: At the start of Sprout's turn, if it is in an area with at least dim light (sunlight or equivalent), it passively regenerates 2 points of Vitality.

talents.name: Iron Bark
talents.effect: As a bonus action, Sprout hardens its bark, gaining a +2 bonus to its damage reduction for 1 round.

talents.name: Taunt
talents.effect: As a major action, you challenge a single enemy who can see you. They must make a Spirit DC 12 check or have disadvantage on attack rolls that do not target you for 1 round.

talents.name: Crushing Vines
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout commands a tangle of vines to attack an enemy, dealing 2d8 physical damage.

talents.name: Seismic Roar (Modifies Slam)
talents.effect: When you use Slam, all enemies in a 10-foot radius around the target must make an Agility DC 14 check or be knocked prone.

talents.name: Roots of the Mountain (Passive)
talents.effect: While planted on the ground, Sprout is immune to all effects that would move or knock it prone.

talents.name: Overgrowth
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout causes a 20-foot radius area to become overgrown with thorny vines. The area is considered difficult terrain.

talents.name: Bulwark
talents.effect: As a major action, you grant an adjacent ally a +1 bonus to their Damage Reduction for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Gaea's Embrace
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout causes the ground beneath a single target to become a sinkhole. The target must make a Might DC 16 check or be restrained and take 2d10 bludgeoning damage at the start of each of their turns.

talents.name: Earthshatter
talents.effect: As a major action, create a shockwave in a 20-foot radius. All creatures on the ground take 4d8 physical damage and are knocked prone.

talents.name: Thorned Body (Passive)
talents.effect: Whenever an enemy hits you with a melee attack, they take physical damage equal to your Might attribute.

talents.name: Living Wall
talents.effect: As a major action, you can move up to half your speed. Any space you move through can become a wall of dense thorns up to 10 feet high, providing total cover.

talents.name: Earth's Grasp
talents.effect: As a major action, you cause roots to erupt from the ground in a 15-foot radius. All enemies in the area must make an Agility DC 16 check or become 'Restrained' for 1 round.

talents.name: Primal Guardian (Passive)
talents.effect: You gain resistance to all physical damage from non-magical sources.

talents.name: Colossus Form
talents.effect: As a major action, you temporarily grow in size, granting you a +2 bonus to Might and a +2 bonus to your damage reduction for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Worldshaker (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout channels its full power into the ground, causing a massive earthquake in a 60-foot radius. All enemies in the area take 6d12 physical damage and are knocked prone. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: One with the World (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout can become a conduit for the life force of Eryndor for 3 rounds. While active, allies within 60 feet cannot be reduced below 1 Vitality, and they are healed for 3d10 Vitality at the start of each of Sprout's turns. This can only be used once per day.

playstyles.description: This path is inspired by Spar's connection to nature and support magic. It focuses on healing, restorative abilities, and powerful utility through the manipulation of plant life.

talents.name: Healing Spores
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout releases a cloud of restorative spores in a 10-foot radius. All allies within the area (including Sprout) are healed for 1d8 Vitality.

talents.name: Thorn Whip
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout can extend a thorny vine up to 30 feet to grapple an enemy, dealing 1d6 piercing damage.

talents.name: Mending Touch
talents.effect: As a major action, restore 2d6 Vitality to a single ally you can touch.

talents.name: Purify
talents.effect: As a major action, touch a target and remove one minor negative status effect (e.g., Blinded, Slowed).

talents.name: Goodberry
talents.effect: Once per day, you can create 1d4 magical berries that each heal 1 Vitality when eaten as a bonus action.

talents.name: Cleansing Bloom
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout purifies the air around an ally, removing one negative status effect.

talents.name: Sunbeam
talents.effect: As a bonus action, Sprout can summon a ray of sunlight on a single ally, restoring 2d8 Vitality.

talents.name: Healing Bloom (Modifies Healing Spores)
talents.effect: When you use Healing Spores, the healing is increased to 2d8 Vitality.

talents.name: Wall of Thorns
talents.effect: Sprout creates a 20-foot long, 5-foot high wall of thorny vines. Any creature passing through it takes 1d8 piercing damage.

talents.name: Forest's Embrace
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout can entangle an enemy with thick vines, forcing a Might DC 14 check. On a failure, the enemy is Restrained and cannot take reactions for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Nature's Vigor (Modifies Healing Spores)
talents.effect: When you use Healing Spores, it also removes the Poisoned status effect from all affected allies.

talents.name: Regrowth
talents.effect: As a major action, you touch an ally. For the next 3 rounds, they regain 1d8 Vitality at the start of their turn.

talents.name: Mass Cleanse
talents.effect: As a major action, you can remove one negative status effect from all allies within a 15-foot radius.

talents.name: Verdant Rebirth
talents.effect: Once per day, as a major action, Sprout can plant a seed on an ally who is Downed. The seed immediately brings the ally back to life with 1 Vitality and a Stable status.

talents.name: Font of Life (Passive)
talents.effect: Sprout's Photosynthesis ability now affects all allies within 10 feet of it.

talents.name: Sanctuary
talents.effect: As a major action, create a 20-foot radius sphere of calming natural energy for 3 rounds. Allies inside are immune to the 'Frightened' condition, and any enemy that enters the area must make a Spirit DC 16 check or lose their will to fight, ending their turn.

talents.name: Genesis Bloom (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, Sprout channels the very essence of life into the battlefield. For 3 rounds, at the start of each of your turns, all allies in a 60-foot radius are healed for 4d10 Vitality. Additionally, any ally who would be reduced to 0 Vitality is instead reduced to 1 Vitality. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: World Tree (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you summon a massive, spectral tree at the center of the battlefield for the duration of the combat. At the start of each of your turns, you can choose one of two effects: 'Golden Apples' (all allies regain 3d10 Vitality) or 'Ironbark Roots' (all enemies are 'Restrained' for 1 round, Agility DC 18 avoids). This can only be used once per day.
